extension.name: org.apache.nifi.apicurio.schemaregistry.ApicurioSchemaRegistry
extension.description: Provides a Schema Registry that interacts with the Apicurio Schema Registry so that those Schemas that are stored in the Apicurio Schema Registry can be used in NiFi. When a Schema is looked up by name by this registry, it will find a Schema in the Apicurio Schema Registry with their artifact identifiers.

property.name: Schema Registry URL
property.description: The URL of the Schema Registry e.g. http://localhost:8080

property.name: Schema Group ID
property.description: The artifact Group ID for the schemas

property.name: Cache Size
property.description: Specifies how many Schemas should be cached from the Schema Registry. The cache size must be a non-negative integer. When it is set to 0, the cache is effectively disabled.

property.name: Cache Expiration
property.description: Specifies how long a Schema that is cached should remain in the cache. Once this time period elapses, a cached version of a schema will no longer be used, and the service will have to communicate with the Schema Registry again in order to obtain the schema.

property.name: Web Client Service Provider
property.description: Controller service for HTTP client operations
